kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Mouse Down
kw.doc: Simulates pressing the left mouse button on the element specified by `locator`.

kw.doc: Verifies image identified by `locator` is found from current page.

The iLAB Johannesburg head office has moved from Woodmead to Sandton CBD.

Until further notice all training courses will be held at Cedar Woods: 120 Western Service Road, Woodmead. For more information please e-mail training@ilabquality.com or contact iLAB on +27 11 033 0200.

INTERNATIONALLY
ACCREDITED
TRAINING

As the leader in independent software quality assurance and testing for over two decades, our training has helped thousands of testers and managers launch their careers to the next level.

Our highly focused, interactive training will offer you an unforgettable and enjoyable learning experience. We offer a wide variety of courses at initial, intermediate and advanced levels. Our courses range from one to five days in duration and, depending on the facilities and number of candidates, can be arranged at your location.

INITIAL LEVEL COURSES

Download Full Training Schedule

PRACTICAL SOFTWARE TESTING

Participants will gain an understanding of software testing and the why, how and when to apply it. Topics include reviews, requirements extraction and management, testing techniques, defect management, testing types, and practical tips and tricks for doing effective testing.

Course Duration: 3 Days

SOFTWARE TESTING OVERVIEW FOR DEVELOPERS

This course is based on the popular Practical Software Testing course and provides valuable testing principles and techniques for developers. The highlights of this course include how to reduce errors upstream, become more productive, and reduce the amount of maintenance work required.

Course Duration: 1 Day

SOFTWARE TESTING OVERVIEW FOR MANAGERS

Based on the popular Practical Software Testing, this course conveys valuable testing insights for managers. The course emphasizes testing best practices and why they are valuable. This education allows managers to make better testing and quality decisions from the underlying principles.

Course Duration: 1 Day

BUSINESS ANALYSIS AND REQUIREMENTS ENGINEERING

Inadequate requirements create nearly 57 percent of all IT defects. Through this training, core requirement techniques are covered to prevent these defects from occurring and equip analysts with skills including: elicitation, analysis, specification, verification, and management.

Course Duration: 3 Days

BASIC PRACTICAL SQL FOR DEVELOPERS

Provides details on how to check database information critical to your systems. Participants get a full understanding of introductory data and database concepts. Learn, in a hands-on way, to build queries. Those who succeed in the course leave equipped to access, read and test common database content.

Course Duration: 2 Days

PRACTICAL USABILITY TESTING

Focuses on usability testing techniques with life cycle development, user-centered design. Participants will enjoy learning the practical approach and real-world application examples.

Course Duration: 2 Days

USER ACCEPTANCE TESTING

As users you may understand the business; however, that’s only half of the solution when it comes to testing a system. This course provides answers to the “What?” “Why?” and the “How?” concerning UAT, and delivers much-improved testing outcomes.

Course Duration: 2 Days

PERFORMANCE TESTING FUNDAMENTALS

Explains the fundamentals throughout performance testing life cycle including: planning, design, test preparation, execution and maintenance.

Course Duration: 1 Day

SECURITY TESTING FUNDAMENTALS

Understand fundamental theoretical framework and practical techniques, along with how to identify best practice security vulnerabilities. Throughout the training, participants will receive education on: overview, user interface, attacks, competitive intelligence scouting, privilege, containment, password cracking and Google hacking.

Course Duration: 1 Day

INTERMEDIATE LEVEL COURSES

Download Full Training Schedule

PRACTICAL SOFTWARE TESTING - ADVANCED

Understand the skills and tools necessary to be able to test in a rapidly changing environment. Participants will not only be taught how to adapt to change but also produce tests where there are poorly specified requirements and focus on how to make appropriate changes and the resulting impact. Topics covered throughout this course include: Exploratory testing, responding to change, testing with mind maps, creating testable requirements from nothing and creating checklists amongst others.

Course Duration: 3 Days

ISTQB FOUNDATION CERTIFICATE IN SOFTWARE TESTING

Teaches excellent testing practices, regardless of the software development Life Cycle (SDLC) used. This course includes education in: fundamentals, testing throughout the SDLC, static techniques, design, management and tool support. Upon the successful completion of the course, an International Certificate will be issued by the appropriate accredited testing body.

Course Duration: 3 Days + Exam

ISTQB AGILE TESTING FOUNDATION LEVEL

Equips participants with knowledge of Agile methods and how to test based upon User Stories. Trainees will understand how to engage with “whole team” concepts that will allow them to collaborate with the Agile team and provide value to stakeholders by being the “testing expert” on the team.

Prerequisites: ISTQB Foundation Certificate in Software Testing.

Course Duration: 2 Days + Exam

ADVANCED LEVEL COURSES

Download Full Training Schedule

ISTQB ADVANCED LEVEL CERTIFICATION IN SOFTWARE TESTING

ADVANCED TEST MANAGER MODULE

Trainees will understand and apply testing in life cycles, create firm foundations, experience estimation and planning, and more. Participants will gain insight on managing test resources, building test teams and applying process improvement models.

Prerequisites: An ISTQB Foundation Certificate in Software Testing. Candidates must either have at least five years’ testing experience, or two years’ experience and an IT related Bachelor’s degree. No prerequisites are needed if candidates sit the course without taking the exam.

Course Duration: 5 Days + Exam

ISTQB ADVANCED LEVEL CERTIFICATION IN SOFTWARE TESTING

ADVANCED TEST ANALYST MODULE

Participants will gain the ability to determine domain validity, identify design techniques, produce quality design specifications with best techniques, and apply techniques to test quality characteristics. Additionally, participants will understand the difference between conditions and cases, as well as when to produce them.

Prerequisites: An ISTQB Foundation Certificate in Software Testing. Candidates must either have at least five years’ testing experience, or two years’ experience and an IT related Bachelor’s degree. No prerequisites are needed if candidates sit the course without taking the exam.

Course Duration: 4 Days + Exam

ISTQB ADVANCED LEVEL CERTIFICATION IN SOFTWARE TESTING

ADVANCED TECHNICAL TEST ANALYST MODULE

Advanced training on Identifying and choosing test design techniques, analysing the internal system to meet expected quality, and understanding the difference between conditions and cases. Participants will use functional-based and other design techniques, evaluate and apply suitable techniques in areas such as performance and reliability, learn static and dynamic analysis principles, and the basis for applying and using keyword-driven scripting.

Prerequisites: An ISTQB Foundation Certificate in Software Testing. Candidates must either have at least five years’ testing experience, or two years’ experience and an IT related Bachelor’s degree. No prerequisites are needed if candidates sit the course without taking the exam.

Course Duration: 3 Days + Exam

DOWNLOAD THE TRAINING CATALOGUE

As the leader in independent software quality assurance and testing for over two decades, our training has helped thousands of testers and managers launch their careers to the next level. Our highly focused, interactive training will offer you an unforgettable and enjoyable learning experience.
